General.Name: Xiangtan Electric Manufacturing Co Ltd
General.Description: Xiangtan Electric Manufacturing Co. Ltd. manufactures and sells electrical products in China and internationally. The company offers electromagnetic energy, motor, and electronic control products. It serves defense, electric power, energy, mining, transportation, chemical, light, water conservancy, and other construction industries. Xiangtan Electric Manufacturing Co. Ltd. was founded in 1936 and is based in Xiangtan, China.

2.Name: Mr. Yi Wen  Li
2.Title: Sec. of the Board of Directors
